long_description: Whether you're trying a route on Denali's South Face or heading into the Karakoram, the Patagonia Ascensionist 45L Pack expands to handle the load when you need additional gear or an overnight kit. Hipbelt padding can be removed to create a simple webbing hipbelt. Aluminum stays with a trampoline center give the pack structure and help to support heavy loads; they can be removed for lightweight pursuits. Spindrift collar opens wide for easy packing; drawcord simultaneously cinches collar and closes lid for a secure seal. Additional spindrift collar deploys to protect your gear when you have overstuffed your pack. Zippered pocket on lid provides easy access to small items. Daisy chains on front and side panels provide lashing options; compression straps on sides help manage different size loads. The Patagonia Ascensionist 45L Pack features a center sheath ice axe carry system that accommodates a wide assortment of axes.
short_description: Whether you're trying a route on Denali's South Face or heading into the Karakoram, the Patagonia Ascensionist 45L Pack expands to handle the load when you need additional gear or an overnight kit.
